## IStudio.initialize() method

Initializes the studio. Call it once in your index.js/index.ts module. It silently ignores subsequent calls.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initialize(opts?: _StudioInitializeOpts): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opts | [\_StudioInitializeOpts](./studio._studioinitializeopts.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
